item.title: PENTHOUSE APARTMENT IN MOMBASA
item.dc:creator: peter
item.description:
Room Details Feel the morning mist pass by your windows, so close you can almost reach out the clouds. We have well appointed deluxe rooms each with a view that is breathtaking.What better place to refresh yourself after a long day Our Rooms  have a  large bed,private bathroom  , shower products,TV with satellite channels,Tea /...
Continue Reading
item.content:encoded:
Room Details

Feel the morning mist pass by your windows, so close you can almost reach out the clouds. We have well appointed deluxe rooms each with a view that is breathtaking.What better place to refresh yourself after a long day
Our Rooms  have a  large bed,private bathroom  , shower products,TV with satellite channels,Tea / Coffee makers, Mini bar with refreshments*, free high speed  wireless internet.

The Space

Acommodation =4
Bathrooms=4
Bedrooms=3
Beds=3

Check in Time : 2.00pm
Check out Time : 5.00pm
Property type :apartment

Amenities

Wifi :free
Elevator :1 elevator
Hair dryer: Yes
Air Conditioning: Yes

Parking :$10/car/night
Safety Box: Yes
Television: Yes

Prices

Extra people: from $21/night
After guests 2 guests
Cleaning fee: $17

Security Deposit:$30
Weekly Discount: 10%

Photos

Description

Our rooms are designed to met ISO standards, are 24 sq m and feature good balconies with beautiful clear views. The entire hotel is easily accessible and has been designed to let you move around without assistance. But should you need a helping hand, our staff is happy to assist

Location
Address:Dolphin Road Off Shanzu Mombasa Kenya
Phone: +254717385652
email: pmwita2017@gmail.com
